metadata.title: Rigid Mini-Thoracoscopy Versus Semirigid Thoracoscopy in Undiagnosed Exudative Pleural Effusion: The MINT Randomized Controlled Trial

inclusion_criteria: Planned for thoracoscopic pleural biopsy for undiagnosed exudative pleural effusion
exclusion_criteria: Myocardial infarction or unstable angina in the preceding 6 weeks
Hypoxemia not correctable with low flow oxygen
Extensive adhesions and lack of pleural space

key_findings: Diagnostic yield of rigid mini-thoracoscopy is not superior to semirigid thoracoscopy.
Use of semirigid thoracoscope may provide greater patient comfort.
conclusions: Diagnostic yield of rigid mini-thoracoscopy is not superior to semirigid thoracoscopy. Use of semirigid thoracoscope may provide greater patient comfort.
